p: During the EKC outbreaks in the Ethnic Primary County and Yongchun Township Central Primary Schools, a total of 38 conjunctival swab specimens were collected from 38 patients with symptoms such as conjunctival congestion and hyperaemia during the acute phase of infection by epidemiology staff of the Diqing Center for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC). After aseptic collection, specimens were transferred to test tubes containing 2 ml minimal essential medium (MEM). Specimens were stored at 4 °C and delivered to the Yunnan Provincial Center for Disease Control (YNCDC), maintaining the cold chain, within 24 h for further investigation.
